mapper.select: SELECT deadline.deadline_id,deadline_time,deadline_price FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_deadline_list dlist ON product.`product_deadline` = dlist.`deadline_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_deadline_center dcenter ON dcenter.`deadline_list_id` = dlist.`deadline_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_deadline deadline ON deadline.`deadline_id` = dcenter.`deadline_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT section.section_id,section_min,section_max,section_price FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_section_list slist ON product.product_section = slist.`section_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_section_center scenter ON scenter.`section_list_id` = slist.`section_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_section section ON scenter.`section_id`= section.`section_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT feature.`feature_id`,feature.`feature_name`,feature.`feature_category` FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_feature_list flist ON product.product_feature = flist.`feature_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_feature_center fcenter ON fcenter.`feature_list_id` = flist.`feature_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_feature feature ON feature.`feature_id` = fcenter.`feature_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT insurance.insurance_id,insurance_name,insurance_price,isum.`insurance_sum`,insurance_details FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_list ilist ON product.product_insurance = ilist.insurance_list_id INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_center icenter ON icenter.`insurance_list_id` = ilist.`insurance_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_insurance insurance ON icenter.`insurance_id`= insurance.`insurance_id` INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_sum isum ON isum.`insurance_sum_id` = insurance.`insurance_sum` WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT insurance_sum.`insurance_sum_id`,insurance_sum.`insurance_sum`,insurance_sum.`insurance_sum_price` FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_sum_list ilist ON product.`product_insurance_sum` = ilist.`insurance_sum_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_sum_center icenter ON icenter.`insurance_sum_list_id` = ilist.`insurance_sum_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_insurance_sum insurance_sum ON icenter.`insurance_sum_id` = insurance_sum.`insurance_sum_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT payment.`payment_id`,payment.`payment_time`,payment.`payment_category` FROM happysys_product product INNER JOIN happysys_payment_list plist ON plist.`paymnet_list_id` = product.`product_payment` INNER JOIN happysys_payment_center pcenter ON pcenter.`payment_list_id` = plist.`paymnet_list_id` INNER JOIN happysys_payment payment ON payment.`payment_id` = pcenter.`payment_id` WHERE product_id = #{productId}
